Name: Surfer Rock
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Defense and Special Defense. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Azurill, Marill, and Azumarill.  Swap a Marill Dew and a Marill Card for a Surfer Rock at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
